Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na otu Ghana bụ King Faisal Babes, n'okpuru nduzi nke Romain Krider, onye nkuzi mbụ ya
Sheikh Mansour, onye nwe Manchester City, kpọrọ ya maka nnwale, na isi ya na Abu Dhabi, ka Al-Jazeera, klọb ọzọ o nwere, hụ ya
O nwekwara nwa aha James Halto N'afọ 2010, ọ nọ n'ụlọ ikpe maka klọb Croatian NK Osijek mana ọ pụghị inweta ikike ọrụ.
N'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2011, ọ sonyeere otu egwuregwu Thai League T1 bụ Buriram United
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị egwu na Thai League T1, a kpọrọ Acheampong maka nnwale na klọb Scotland Celtic na Disemba 2012. N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013, Acheampong kwagara na klọb Belgian R.S.C
Anderlecht na mgbazinye ego ruo na ngwụcha oge 2012-2013.
Na 16 Eprel 2013, Acheampong bịanyere aka na ndị mmeri Belgian R.S.C
Na 28 Julaị, Acheampong mere ngosipụta mbụ ya maka Anderlecht megide KSC Lokeren; ọ batara na nkeji iri asaa na ọkpụ 2–3
Na 4–1 meriri KAA Gent, ọ batara na nkeji iri isii na itoolu wee nye goolu mbụ ya na Belgium
Na 17 Septemba Acheampong mere egwuregwu mbụ UEFA Champions League megide Benfica; ọ bịara dịka onye nnọchi anya na nkeji iri anọ na isii; ọ kwụsịrị dị ka mmeri Benfica.

N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2017, Anderlecht kwupụtara na Acheampong sonyeere ndị otu Chinese Super League bụ Tianjin TEDA na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ọnwa isii. O mere nke mbụ ya na 22 Julaị 2017
Ọ gbara goolu anọ n'egwuregwu iri na abụọ n'afọ 2017 nke mere ka Tianjin Teda nọrọ n'elu ụgbọ elu maka oge ọzọ
Na 8 Nọvemba 2017, Tianjin Teda gosipụtara nhọrọ ịbịanye aka na Acheampong.
